character.name: Randall
description: A playtester, his cards dabble in all basic aspects of the game.

ship.name: Rigel
ship.description: A large laboratory ship. It has the means to remove its own unnecessary components.

description.None: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=3e8ad5>Randall</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=3e8ad5>Randall</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=3e8ad5>Randall</c> cards to your hand, twice.

DisposableShredder.name: Disposable Shredder
DisposableShredder.description: Select a card in hand, shred it.

ChargeUp.name: Synergy Charge
ChargeUp.description: When you accumulate {0} <c=status>SYNERGY CHARGES</c>, lose them and shoot for {1} damage.

CoPilotStatus.name: Co-Pilot
CoPilotStatus.description: On turn start, gain {0} <c=status>HALF EVADE</c>, also gain an <c=status>ENERGY FRAGMENT</c>.

AuxiliaryShieldsStatus.name: Auxiliary Shields
AuxiliaryShieldsStatus.description: On turn start, gain {0} <c=status>HALF SHIELD</c>, also gain an <c=status>ENERGY FRAGMENT</c>.

OverchargeStatus.name: Overcharge
OverchargeStatus.description: You need <c=status>{0}</c> extra <c=status>SYNERGY CHARGE</c> to fire, but you deal {0} extra damage when you do.

ArchiveStatus.name: Synergy Accelerator
ArchiveStatus.description: On turn start, gain {0} <c=status>HALF CARD</c> and {0} cards become <c=status>SYNERGIZED</c>.

DummyHalvesStatus.name: Partial Statuses
description: <c=status>Half Evade</c>, <c=status>Half Shield</c>, <c=status> Half Temp Shield</c>, <c=status> Half Card</c>, <c=status> Half Damage</c>, <c=status> Energy Fragment</c>, <c=status> Synergy Charge</c>.

SparePiecesArtifact.name: SPARE PIECES
SparePiecesArtifact.description: On turn start: gain 1 random <c=status>HALF EVADE</c>, <c=status>HALF SHIELD</c> or <c=status>HALF CARD</c>.

EnhancedMaterialsArtifact.name: ENHANCED MATERIALS
EnhancedMaterialsArtifact.description: On pickup: gain 1 <c=status>MAX HULL</c> and 1 <c=status>MAX SHIELD</c>, heal 2 hull.

PatchingProgramArtifact.name: PATCHING PROGRAM
PatchingProgramArtifact.description: On pickup: select a card to upgrade.

TeapotArtifact.name: TEAPOT
TeapotArtifact.description: On turn start: A card in draw pile, discard or hand becomes Synergized.

DivertedChargeArtifact.name: DIVERTED CHARGE
DivertedChargeArtifact.description: On turn start: Spend 2 <c=status>SYNERGY CHARGE</c> to gain 1 energy.

RepurposedPartsArtifact.name: HALF OF A COOKIE
RepurposedPartsArtifact.description: On turn start: Spend 1 random <c=status>Half Evade</c> or <c=status>Half Shield</c> or <c=status>Half Temp Shield</c> or <c=status>Half Card</c> or <c=status>Half Damage</c> to draw a card.

ASynergize.name: Synergize
ASynergize.description: Make {{count}} cards <c=status>SYNERGIZED</c>, prioritizes cards in draw pile, then discard, then hand.

Synergized.name: Synergized
Synergized.description: On play: gain 1 <c=status>SYNERGY CHARGE</c>, lose this trait.
